kv2.9:10.1_0: What does a person practice to perfection, but what is it drawn away?
kv2.9:10.2_0: They split greed for form, desire for rebirth in this or that.
kv2.9:10.3_0: The perfected one has attained the four directions. And they don’t have direct meditative experience of the four liberations. They haven’t attained perfection ...
kv2.9:10.3_3: it’s finished with defilements ended; he has completed the spiritual journey; with the burden, achieved their own true goal, utterly ended the fetters of rebirth, and is rightly freed through enlightenment; he has given up the fetters of rebirth, and is completely understood. He has completely understood the origin of suffering and complete understanding. He has given up the ending of defilements, fading away, cessation, giving away, and letting go of noble truth.
